name: Justin Smith's Realistic Summer Sports Simulator
name_original: Justin Smith's Realistic Summer Sports Simulator
description:
Compete in the ultimate test of strength! endurance! and skill!

For up 4 players!

Go for Gold in 15 events:
* Diving
* Javelin
* Equestrian
* 100m Dash
* Rowing
* Gymnastic Rings
* High Jump
* Pole Vault
* Weightlifting
* Swimming
* Racewalking
* Hammer Throw
* Cycling
* Archery
* Whitewater Slalom
